text: Algirdas Pocius (28 August 1930 – 14 August 2021) was a Lithuanian politician and writer. He was born in Mažeikiai District Municipality, then-Soviet Union. Pocius was a member of the CPSU and LDDP. From 1992 until 1996, he was a member of the Seimas. Pocius died on 14 August 2021 at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Members of the Seimas Category:Lithuanian writers
title: Algirdas Pocius
